text: “(E iwe Mtumiki! Pitiriza kuwafunsa) kodi kapena (wabwino) ndiamene adalenga thambo ndi nthaka (ndi zam’menemo) ndi kukutsitsirani madzi (mvula yothandiza) kuchokera kumwamba, choncho ndi madziwo timameretsa madimba okongola. Inu simungathe kumeretsa mitengo yake. Kodi pamodzi ndi Allah pali mulungu (wina)? Koma iwo (Akafiri) ndi anthu opotoka
